Package com.example.lotteryevent.viewmodels

Class ConfirmDrawAndNotifyViewModel

java.lang.Object
androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
com.example.lotteryevent.viewmodels.ConfirmDrawAndNotifyViewModel
public class ConfirmDrawAndNotifyViewModel extends androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
ViewModel for ConfirmDrawAndNotifyFragment This class handles the logic behind allowing the organizer to view the number of entrants drawn, confirm draw, and notify the selected entrants.
